## The "standard" case as in Acemoglu et al. (2016) 

First, we discuss the "standard" case with one event-date. This is equivalent to the setting of Acemoglu et al. (2016).

```{r setup}
rm(list=ls(all.names = TRUE))
devtools::load_all()
library(synthReturn)

results <- synthReturn(
  data = ret_one_evdate,
    tidname = "treatid",
    cidname = "controlid",
    rname = "ret",
    dname = "date",
    edname = "eventdate",
    estwind = c(-100,-1),
    eventwind = c(0,5),
    estobs_min = 1,
    eventobs_min = 1,
    placebo = TRUE,
    ngroup = 2,
    ndraws = 10
)

```
